title: Human rights video kit. Parts 1 & 2
creator_contributor_role: Education Department of Western Australia, production company
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children's rights
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Human rights
description: Highlights the problems associated with the protection of basic human rights as experienced trough the work of Ammesty International and similar organizations. Part 1 Dramatizes what it would be like to be an adolescent whose human rights were completely removed. Part 2 Provides a case history of a person detained without reason for helping student dissenters.
